title: Roasted red pepper soup
ingredients: ['60ml (2 fl oz) olive oil', '2 onions, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon fennel seeds', '1/2 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme leaves', '1 bay leaf', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '3 green chillies, finely chopped', '6 roasted red peppers - skinned, seeded and chopped', '225g (8 oz) plum tomatoes - skinned, seeded and chopped', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1.5L vegetable stock', '235ml (7 1/2 fl oz) double cream', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil leaves']
